import React from 'react' import './project.css' import GitHubButton from 'react-github-btn' import projectImage from '../../assets/ProjectImages/portfolioSite.png' import java from '../../assets/icons/java.svg' const Project3 = ({imgUrl, date, header, content}) => (
{/* */}

{date}

{header}

This section describes this portfolio site! It was built using React.js for the front-end and uses a clean and simple look while also having multiple nice-to-have features for easy user experience such as a reactive design which reponds to the screen dimensions, meaning that it is usable on mobile. This portfolio website evolces and grows constantly, so there will be much more to add.

); export default Project3
